```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
to_render <- list.files()
links <- sapply(X = to_render, FUN = function(x){
  paste0("<li>[", x, "](",x,")</li><br>")
})
names(links) <- NULL
cat(noquote("<ul>"))
cat(noquote(links))
cat(noquote("</ul>"))
```
